post:
**Host<font color="green">Doc</font>** is pleased to announce our new range of shared and reseller hosting plans sure to please those whom require consistant uptime as well as fluid hosting.
Our shared hosting utilises NVMe SSD and is hosted in Germany while our reseller hosting utilizes HDD and is hosted in the UK.
Both have Cloudlinux, cagefs, php selector, node.js, autoSSL, softaculous, railgun, jetbackup, daily local backups, weekly offsite backups, 24/7 support and the performance you'd expect from a hosting plan.

**Shared Hosting Mini**

    1GB NVMe SSD Disk Storage
    500GB Bandwidth
    1 Hosted Domains
    1 Mailbox
    1 MySQL Database

£6.50 Per Year
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=243)

**First Response**

    3GB NVMe SSD Storage
    200GB Bandwidth
    5 Hosted Domains
    20 Mailboxes
    10 MySQL Databases
    5 Addon Domains

£8.00 Per Year
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=770)

**The Antidote**

    6GB NVMe SSD Storage
    1TB Bandwidth
    20 Hosted Domains
    100 Mailboxes
    50 MySQL Databases
    20 Addon Domains

£12.00 Per Year
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=771)

**Outbreak**

    10GB NVMe SSD Storage

    Unlimited MySQL Databases
    Unlimited Addon Domains

£18 Per Year
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=772)

[More info](https://hostdoc.co.uk/shared-hosting) on our shared hosting.
[Shared Server Uptime Stats](https://status.hostdoc.co.uk/780596370)
